mapper.insert: insert into member(id, pw, name, age, email, tel, zipcode, roadAddr, jibunAddr, detailAddr) values(#{id}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{age}, #{email}, #{tel}, #{zipcode}, #{roadAddr}, #{jibunAddr}, #{detailAddr})
mapper.update: update member set id=#{id}, pw=#{pw},age=#{age}, email=#{email}, tel=#{tel}, detailAddr=#{detailAddr} where no=#{no}
mapper.select: select name from member where id = #{id} and pw=#{pw}
mapper.update: update member set cNum=#{cNum}, isRented="Y" where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select id from member where id = #{mId}
